topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5596276a63687275e00007d1#post_5596276a63687275e00007d1
Call me crazy, but I think we might survive the end of the universe.

When you get down to it what is outside the universe is potentially a undefined universe not every expanding but actually unlimited in dimension without any energy, matter or laws of physics.  If there was a crack in the universe to the outside of the universe I would drastically have to suggest not going through the crack because it would be a universe where nothing makes sense.

Think of the outside of the universe as a place where there is no time or anything.
